attributes.action: Make schools teach how to live (what to do in different situations in life etc.)
attributes.additional_details: In my opinion a lot of teenagers don't know how to "live", some teens just don't know how to act in stressful situations and how to do basic things, I think schools can fix that.
attributes.background: I want schools to teach teenagers how to do basic things in life, basic life skills and how to act in different situations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647082
